com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap

Class BootstrapProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.BootstrapProgressBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BootstrapBrandView, BootstrapSizeView, ProgressView, RoundableView

    public class BootstrapProgressBar
extends View
implements ProgressView, BootstrapBrandView, RoundableView, BootstrapSizeView
    BootstrapProgressBar displays determinate progress to the user, and is colored with BootstrapBrands. Striped effects and progress update animations are supported out of the box.

    • Field Summary

        public void setAnimated(boolean animated)
        Description copied from interface: ProgressView
        Sets whether the view should animate itself. If the view is striped, the animation will run in an infinite loop; if the view is not striped, the animation will only be visible when setProgress() is called.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        animated - whether the view should animate its updates or not.

        public float getBootstrapSize()
        Description copied from interface: BootstrapSizeView
        Retrieves the scale factor that should be used to scale a view from its baseline size. For example, specifying that a Button should use a scale factor of 2.0 may increase its padding and font size by that factor.
        Specified by:
